name: roo-autograding
description: AI-powered auto-grading system for educational assignments

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.quality:complexity: npx complexity-report functions/src/ && npx complexity-report frontend/src/
scripts.quality:report: npm run quality:check && npm run quality:complexity
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd functions && npm run deploy
scripts.serve: npm run build:backend && cd functions && npm run serve
